erlingwl wrote:
> My opinion is that one could create the Semantic Web with RESTful Web
> Services by just adding semantic annotations to existing Web pages.

See also "RDF hyperlinking"

http://www.w3.org/2001/sw/Europe/talks/xml2003/Overview-6.html

I also touched on the topic briefly in a talk in XTech 2005:

http://idealliance.org/proceedings/xtech05/papers/02-07-04/

Cheers,

L.
